item.title: Trump threatens Russia with sanctions, tariffs if Putin doesn't end Ukraine war
item.description: The war in Ukraine began with an invasion by Russia in February 2022. More than 240,000 soldiers have been killed on both sides, according to Ukraine.

item.title: Musk undercuts Trump on Stargate AI investment announcement
item.description: Open AI CEO Sam Altman, Oracle co-founder Larry Ellison and Softbank CEO Masayoshi Son appeared alongside President Donald Trump to announce the Starg...

item.title: Trump pardons Silk Road creator Ross Ulbricht
item.description: President Trump grants full pardon to Silk Road founder Ross Ulbricht, early bitcoin advocate.

item.title: Quad foreign ministers meet in Washington in signal of Trump's China focus
item.description: The United States, Australia, India and Japan recommitted to working together on Tuesday, after the first meeting since Trump's return to the White Ho...

item.title: Trump announces AI infrastructure investment backed by Oracle, OpenAI and Softbank
item.description: President Donald Trump announced a venture with OpenAI, Oracle and Softbank to invest billions of dollars in U.S. AI infrastructure.
